name: FemaleSterilizationSNOMEDProvisionProcedures
title: Female Sterilization SNOMED Provision Procedures
description: For Contraceptive eCQMs Approval for Trial Use application in Spring 2022; This set of values contains codes for female sterilization for contraception (e.g., bilateral tubal ligation, bilateral salpingectomy).
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Family Planning - provision of most and moderately effective contraceptive methods among females ages 15-44),(Data Element Scope: Procedure codes for female sterilization for contraception (e.g., bilateral tubal ligation, bilateral salpingectomy).),(Inclusion Criteria: Procedure codes for female sterilization for contraception (e.g., bilateral tubal ligation, bilateral salpingectomy).),(Exclusion Criteria: Any contraceptive method that is not female sterilization, and unilateral tubal ligation or salpingectomy; Most effective (i.e., IUDs/IUSs, contraceptive implants) or moderately effective (i.e., oral pills, patch, or ring) methods of contraception; Less effective methods of contraception (i.e., diaphragm, male condom, female condom, withdrawal, sponge, fertility-awareness based methods, spermicide))
